sourceMeaningMnemonic: If you <radical>loiter</radical> around my <radical>skin</radical>, <kanji>he</kanji> will get angry at you. He is my boyfriend and he is very protective of me. So don’t loiter around my skin for too long or he will beat you up.
meaningInfo: He is a jealous guy. He will beat you down if you loiter around my skin for too long. Imagine he is beating you up right now. He is screaming at you as he does so.
readingMnemonic: <kanji>He</kanji> says the only way he will stop beating you up is if you give him some <reading>curry</reading> (<ja>かれ</ja>). You give him some curry.
readingInfo: He accepts the curry you give him. Smell the curry smell as he eats it right in front of you. He is eating very loudly.
